title: Add a Commit Message Template
description: When working on a project, it is important to have a consistent and informative commit message for each change made to the codebase. This helps other developers understand the purpose of the change and makes it easier to track down bugs or revert changes if necessary. In this challenge, you will learn how to set up a commit message template for a Git repository.

meta.title: Mastering Commit Message Templates | Git Playground
meta.description: Learn how to set up a commit message template for a Git repository to improve collaboration and productivity in your programming projects.
